00076     public static function createThumbnail( $sFileName, $sThumbName = null, $iThumbWidth = null, $iThumbHeight = null )
00077     {
00078         $_iType = null;
00079         $_bResult = false;
00080         
00081         $iThumbWidth = PS::nvl( $iThumbWidth, self::$m_iThumbnailWidth );
00082         $iThumbHeight = PS::nvl( $iThumbHeight, self::$m_iThumbnailHeight );
00083         $sThumbName = PS::nvl( $sThumbName, self::getThumbnailFilename( $sFileName ) );
00084         
00085         //  Get some info on the file...
00086         if ( $_arSize = getimagesize( $sFileName ) )
00087         {
00088             switch ( $_arSize[ 2 ] )
00089             {
00090                 case IMAGETYPE_GIF:
00091                     $_sSourceImage = imagecreatefromgif( $sFileName );
00092                     break;
00093                     
00094                 case IMAGETYPE_PNG:
00095                     $_sSourceImage = imagecreatefrompng( $sFileName );
00096                     break;
00097                     
00098                 case IMAGETYPE_JPEG:
00099                     $_sSourceImage = imagecreatefromjpeg( $sFileName );
00100                     break;
00101             }
00102         
00103             if ( $_sSourceImage )
00104             {
00105                 $_iSourceWidth = imageSX( $_sSourceImage );
00106                 $_iSourceHeight = imageSY( $_sSourceImage );
00107                 
00108                 //  Calculate correct size keeping aspect ratio...
00109                 if ( $_iSourceWidth > $_iSourceHeight )
00110                 {
00111                     $_iDestWidth = $iThumbWidth;
00112                     $_iDestHeight = $_iSourceHeight * ( $iThumbHeight / $_iSourceWidth );
00113                 }
00114                 else if ( $_iSourceWidth < $_iSourceHeight )
00115                 {
00116                     $_iDestWidth = $_iSourceWidth * ( $iThumbWidth / $_iSourceHeight );
00117                     $_iDestHeight = $iThumbHeight;
00118                 }
00119                 else
00120                 {
00121                     $_iDestWidth = $iThumbWidth;
00122                     $_iDestHeight = $iThumbHeight;
00123                 }
00124                 
00125                 //  Makethe new image
00126                 if ( $_sDestImage = imagecreatetruecolor( $_iDestWidth, $_iDestHeight ) )
00127                 {
00128                     imagecopyresampled( $_sDestImage, $_sSourceImage, 0, 0, 0, 0, $_iDestWidth, $_iDestHeight, $_iSourceWidth, $_iSourceHeight );
00129 
00130                     switch ( $_arSize[ 2 ] )
00131                     {
00132                         case IMAGETYPE_GIF:
00133                             imagegif( $_sDestImage, $sThumbName );
00134                             break;
00135                             
00136                         case IMAGETYPE_PNG:
00137                             imagepng( $_sDestImage, $sThumbName );
00138                             break;
00139                             
00140                         case IMAGETYPE_JPEG:
00141                             imagejpeg( $_sDestImage, $sThumbName );
00142                             break;
00143                     }
00144 
00145                     imagedestroy( $_sDestImage ); 
00146                     $_bResult = true;
00147                 }
00148 
00149                 imagedestroy( $_sSourceImage ); 
00150             }
00151         }
00152         
00153         //  Did it work?
00154         return $_bResult;
00155     }
00156     
00157     /***
00158     * Creates a thumbnail image file name from the class template
00159     * 
00160     * @param string $sBaseName
00161     * @return string
00162     * @static
00163     */
00164     public static function getThumbnailFilename( $sBaseName )
00165     {
00166         //  Strip off the path...
00167         $_arFileInfo = pathinfo( $sBaseName );
00168         $_sThumbName = str_ireplace( '{filename}', $_arFileInfo['basename'], self::$m_sThumbnailTempate );
00169         return ( $_arFileInfo['dirname'] != '.' ? $_arFileInfo['dirname'] . DIRECTORY_SEPARATOR : '' ) . $_sThumbName;
00170     }
